Sri Haidakhan Babaji - Hadiakhandi Arati with Sri Babaji Singing Mantras
Hadiakhandi Arati with Sri Babaji Singing Mantras
Sri Haidakhan Babaji - Hadiakhandi Arati with Sri Babaji Singing Mantras

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on January 01, 2022 Description from Terminal Escape:
In under the wire. Breathe......breathe. One very primitive SRI HAIDAKHAN BABAJI field chant from 1979 followed by a slightly more complete mantra with a death march to peace vibe, appropriately recorded just before his death in 1984. The closer is a celebration, presented in full force. Take it all in and then, hopefully, let it all out. HAIDAKHANDI ARATI WITH SRI BABAJI SINGING MANTRAS
